Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink, writ large.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394399) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394399)
